question.body: How does the structure of keratin create the hard waterproofing quality of nails, hair and skin?

multiple_choice.choice: By adding strength with dialanine bridges.
By adding strength with vitamin D.
By polymerization of intermediate filament proteins.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Keratin has disulfide bridges for strength.
Incorrect. Vitamin D will help with calcium absorption and bone strength.
Correct. This polymerization of the proteins provides strength.
Incorrect. Collagen fibers are an important extracellular protein.
